entry.source: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,138}{F813,0,350601}Huh? What the--?{F801}Hey, get me out of here!{F801}{F802}{F813,0,350602}Ohhhh...!{F801}Am I gonna be burned alive!?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,138}{F813,0,350601}Huh? What the--?{F801}Hey, get me out of here!{F801}{F802}{F813,0,350602}Ohhhh...!{F801}Am I gonna be burned alive!?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,138}{F813,0,350603}Wait, they caught me again!?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,350604}Why the hell does this keep{F801}happening!?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,138}{F813,0,350603}Wait, they caught me again!?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,350604}Why the hell does this keep{F801}happening!?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,138}{F813,0,350605}Oh come on! What the hell!{F801}{F802}{F813,0,350606}Why do they want to roast me so bad!?{F801}What is wrong with these things!?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,138}{F813,0,350605}Oh come on! What the hell!{F801}{F802}{F813,0,350606}Why do they want to roast me so bad!?{F801}What is wrong with these things!?{F801}

entry.source: 〉 You have defeated the demons and{F801}rescued Nozomi.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 You have defeated the demons and{F801}rescued Nozomi.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Nozomi has been trapped within the{F801}demon's body!{F801}
